data.prayer: Spirit, inspire Bible translators to communicate the Scriptures accurately in the heart languages spoken in Selibe Phikwe, Botswana.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Selibe Phikwe, Botswana
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Jesus, protect the vulnerable in Selibe Phikwe, Botswana from the evil one.
data.verse: My prayer is not that you take them out of the world but that you protect them from the evil one.

data.prayer: God in Heaven, only you can and should appoint evangelists. Please, appoint and send more to Selibe Phikwe, Botswana.
data.verse: And in the church God has appointed first of all apostles, second prophets, third teachers, then workers of miracles, and those with gifts of healing, helping, administration, and various tongues.

data.prayer: Spirit, disrupt complacency in the 4,112 believers living in the state of Selibe Phikwe. Remind them you are coming soon.
data.verse: Therefore, stay awake, for you do not know on what day your Lord is coming.

data.prayer: Lord, use Google search to lead people in Selibe Phikwe, Botswana to the gospel today.
Jesus, please give the apostles in Selibe Phikwe, Botswana a vision for the harvest, and a passion to see the gospel spread to every corner of the the state.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Father, defend those who are loyal to your Word in the state of Selibe Phikwe, even against fierce enemies.
data.verse: Though the wicked bind me with ropes, I will not forget your law.

data.section_summary:
the state of Selibe Phikwe, Botswana has a population of 49,800.

We estimate Selibe Phikwe has 4,112 people who might know Jesus, 28,514 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 17,174 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 12 neighbors who need Jesus.
